span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 取代，替代： to displace in favor of another
【例】 That edition of the dictionary that you have has been superseded by a more recent one. 你买的那一版的字典已经被最近新出的版本取代了。
【近】 displace, relieve, replace, substitute, supplant, cut out

【记】 super + sede 坐；
【另】 sedition 煽动叛乱, preside (前面+坐)主持
